Coral India Finance and Housing Ltd Company Profile

Coral India Finance and Housing Limited is an India-based housing development company, which is engaged in the business of finance, construction, development and maintenance of properties. The Company's main products and services are investment and construction. The Company operates through two segments: Investment and Construction. The Company has developed projects spread across commercial complexes and residential developments. Its projects include Coral Garden Square Bungalow Scheme, Coral Garden Twin Bungalow Scheme and Coral Heights. Read More
